languages.text: Старый щит покрыт запекшейся кровью и присохшими ошметками кожи. Стоит взять его в руки, как в груди начинает клокотать неизбывная ярость.
This old shield is caked with blood and dried scraps of skin. As soon as you pick it up, unquenchable rage begins to boil inside your chest.
languages.original_text: Старый щит покрыт запекшейся кровью и присохшими ошметками кожи. Стоит взять его в руки, как в груди начинает клокотать неизбывная ярость.

traits.locale_text: This old shield is caked with blood and dried scraps of skin. As soon as you pick it up, unquenchable rage begins to boil inside your chest.
This old shield is caked with blood and dried scraps of skin. As soon as you pick it up, unquenchable rage begins to boil inside your chest.
This old shield is caked with blood and dried scraps of skin. As soon as you pick it up, unquenchable rage begins to boil inside your chest.
This old shield is caked with blood and dried scraps of skin. As soon as you pick it up, unquenchable rage begins to boil inside your chest.
This old shield is caked with blood and dried scraps of skin. As soon as you pick it up, unquenchable rage begins to boil inside your chest.
This old shield is caked with blood and dried scraps of skin. As soon as you pick it up, unquenchable rage begins to boil inside your chest.

languages.text: Este viejo escudo está recubierto de sangre y restos de piel seca. En cuanto lo coges, una furia insaciable empieza a arder en tu pecho.
languages.original_text: This old shield is caked with blood and dried scraps of skin. As soon as you pick it up, unquenchable rage begins to boil inside your chest.

traits.locale_text: Este viejo escudo está recubierto de sangre y restos de piel seca. En cuanto lo coges, una furia insaciable empieza a arder en tu pecho.

languages.text: 这面旧盾牌上沾满了鲜血与风干的皮屑。当你拿起这面盾牌时，你感到无法抑制的怒火在你的胸膛里沸腾。
languages.original_text: This old shield is caked with blood and dried scraps of skin. As soon as you pick it up, unquenchable rage begins to boil inside your chest.

traits.locale_text: 这面旧盾牌上沾满了鲜血与风干的皮屑。当你拿起这面盾牌时，你感到无法抑制的怒火在你的胸膛里沸腾。

languages.text: この古い盾は血と乾いた皮膚がこびりついている。それを持ち上げるとすぐに、抑えられない怒りが胸の中から沸き立ち始める。
languages.original_text: This old shield is caked with blood and dried scraps of skin. As soon as you pick it up, unquenchable rage begins to boil inside your chest.

traits.locale_text: この古い盾は血と乾いた皮膚がこびりついている。それを持ち上げるとすぐに、抑えられない怒りが胸の中から沸き立ち始める。

languages.text: Dieser alte Schild ist mit Blut und getrockneten Hautfetzen bedeckt. Als du es aufhebst, breitet sich in deiner Brust eine unstillbare Wut aus.
languages.original_text: This old shield is caked with blood and dried scraps of skin. As soon as you pick it up, unquenchable rage begins to boil inside your chest.

traits.locale_text: Dieser alte Schild ist mit Blut und getrockneten Hautfetzen bedeckt. Als du es aufhebst, breitet sich in deiner Brust eine unstillbare Wut aus.

languages.text: Ce vieux bouclier est couvert de sang et de lambeaux de peau desséchés. Dès que vous le ramassez, une rage insatiable se met à bouillir en votre for intérieur.
languages.original_text: This old shield is caked with blood and dried scraps of skin. As soon as you pick it up, unquenchable rage begins to boil inside your chest.

traits.locale_text: Ce vieux bouclier est couvert de sang et de lambeaux de peau desséchés. Dès que vous le ramassez, une rage insatiable se met à bouillir en votre for intérieur.

languages.text: Bu eski kalkan, kanla ve kurumuş deri parçalarıyla kaplı. Eline aldığın gibi göğsünde bastırılamaz bir öfke kaynamaya başlıyor.
languages.original_text: This old shield is caked with blood and dried scraps of skin. As soon as you pick it up, unquenchable rage begins to boil inside your chest.

traits.locale_text: Bu eski kalkan, kanla ve kurumuş deri parçalarıyla kaplı. Eline aldığın gibi göğsünde bastırılamaz bir öfke kaynamaya başlıyor.
